trigger_event: Nikola receives both the secret 2022 Council selection simulation files and the testimonies of the erased citizens—a choice must be made about which to leak first.
dilemma: Nikola must choose whether to expose the Council's systemic corruption through the 2022 simulation leaks or to reveal the fabricated erasures and give the vanished citizens a direct voice. The first revelation will channel the city’s unrest in wildly different directions.
reason: Each leak will drive a different kind of chaos: institutional collapse versus mass reckoning. Nikola, balancing his old loyalties and his talk with Alex about justice versus order, fears the consequences no matter what, but knows he cannot choose both.
choice_a: Leak the Council selection simulation footage and files to fuel public calls for accountability at the highest level.
belief_a: Without open reckoning at the top, no real order can be restored.
Transparency about power is the first step to regaining trust, painful as it may be.
True stability rests on exposing and removing corrupted authority.
choice_b: Broadcast the erased citizens’ testimonies and personal data to ignite empathy and a citywide demand for inclusive justice.
belief_b: Justice starts with those most harmed: the erased deserve the first voice.
Empathy and lived truth can awaken the city to systemic cruelty.
Restoring trust means inviting victims out of the shadows, even at the cost of disorder.
